Title: Wild Card
Overview: When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play… and it's all or nothing.
Tagline: Never bet against a man with a killer hand.
production_companies: Current Entertainment, Lionsgate, Sierra / Affinity, SJ Heat Productions, Silver State Production Services, Cinema Seven Productions, SJ Pictures
Cast: Jason Statham, Michael Angarano, Milo Ventimiglia
